whyPluggedin.title: Why plugged.in?
whyPluggedin.subtitle: Your AI needs more than just conversation

problem.title: The Missing Pieces
problem.description: Your AI is powerful, but it lacks three essential capabilities: Knowledge from your specific documents, Memory of past interactions, and Tools to take real actions. Without these, every conversation starts from scratch.

solution.title: Complete Your AI
solution.description: plugged.in provides the trinity your AI needs:
solution.benefit1: ðŸ“š Knowledge: Upload documents and let AI access your specific context
solution.benefit2: ðŸ§  Memory: Coming soon - persistent context across all conversations
solution.benefit3: ðŸ”§ Tools: Connect any MCP server to give AI real-world capabilities
solution.benefit4: ðŸ”„ Universal: Works with Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, and all major models

bridge.title: Built on Open Standards
bridge.description: We leverage Model Context Protocol (MCP) as the technical foundation - not because it's trendy, but because it's the open standard that makes true data ownership possible. MCP ensures your data isn't locked in proprietary platforms but instead becomes your portable asset.

cta.title: One platform. All models. Your data. Your future.
cta.subtitle: Join thousands who've taken control of their AI-generated data

aiModels.title: One Platform, Every Model
aiModels.subtitle: All models access the same knowledge base, use the same tools, and will share the same memory.
aiModels.moreModels: Plus dozens more models through our Langchain integration

feature1.title: Shared Knowledge Base
feature1.description: Every model can query your documents and access your custom context.

feature2.title: Universal Tool Access
feature2.description: All models can use the same MCP tools to take actions.

feature3.title: Persistent Memory (Coming)
feature3.description: Soon - conversations with any model will build on shared memory.

cta.title: Ready to test with multiple models?

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your MCP servers
features.sectionTitle: The Three Pillars of AI Enhancement
features.sectionSubtitle: Knowledge to understand, Memory to learn, Tools to act.

universalAiHub.title: Universal AI Hub
universalAiHub.description: Connect Claude, GPT, Llama, and any AI model through one interface. Test the same prompt across models instantly.

dataSovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
dataSovereignty.description: Every prompt, configuration, and insight stays under your control. Export your data anytime in open formats.

aiAssetManagement.title: AI Asset Management
aiAssetManagement.description: Your prompts, configurations, and context become reusable assets. Build a library of what works for your specific needs.

crossModelMemory.title: Cross-Model Memory
crossModelMemory.description: Coming Soon: Build knowledge that works across all AI tools, not trapped in one platform.

mcpRegistry.title: MCP Registry
mcpRegistry.description: Access 500+ integrations through the open MCP standard. One-click installation with community ratings and reviews.

endToEndEncryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEndEncryption.description: Military-grade protection for your AI intellectual property. Your configurations and data stay secure at rest and in transit.

trendingAnalytics.title: Trending Analytics
trendingAnalytics.description: Discover popular servers with real-time analytics. Learn from the community while keeping your data private.

oauthTokenManagement.title: OAuth & Token Management
oauthTokenManagement.description: Secure authentication flows with built-in OAuth support. Manage tokens and permissions across all your AI services.

communitySharing.title: Social Platform & Community
communitySharing.description: Share MCP servers, follow developers, get notifications, and build your AI network. Public profiles, ratings, and collaborative discovery.

collectionManagement.title: Smart Collections with Version Control
collectionManagement.description: Organize servers into versioned collections. Share publicly or privately, track installations, and collaborate on curated toolsets.

workspaceOrganization.title: Multi-Workspace Management
workspaceOrganization.description: Isolate projects with dedicated workspaces. Switch contexts instantly between development, staging, and production environments.

advancedSearch.title: Intelligent Discovery Engine
advancedSearch.description: Find the perfect MCP server across GitHub, Smithery, and npm. Filter by capabilities, ratings, and community recommendations.

mcpPlayground.title: Universal AI Playground
mcpPlayground.description: Test MCP servers with any model - Claude, GPT, Llama, and more. Virtual scrolling for large conversations and custom instructions support.

ragIntegration.title: AI Knowledge Platform (RAG)
ragIntegration.description: Upload documents, create knowledge bases, and query them through any MCP client. Secure, project-based isolation with enterprise-grade security.

documentLibrary.title: Document Library
documentLibrary.description: Upload PDFs, DOCX, TXT, and Markdown files. Your AI can query and reference your specific documents.

aiDocumentExchange.title: AI-Generated Documents
aiDocumentExchange.description: Let AI models create and update documents in your library. Full version tracking and attribution.

semanticSearch.title: Semantic Search
semanticSearch.description: Query your entire knowledge base with natural language. Find relevant context instantly.

customInstructions.title: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.description: Auto-inject context and instructions into every tool. Your AI knows your preferences.

realtimeNotifications.title: Real-time Notifications
realtimeNotifications.description: Get alerts from AI workflows via notifications and optional email delivery.

notifications.title: Real-time Activity Monitoring
notifications.description: Track all MCP operations with detailed logs, execution analytics, and custom notifications with optional email delivery.

security.title: Enterprise Security & Privacy
security.description: Multi-layer authentication, Firejail sandboxing, comprehensive audit trails, and self-hosting options for complete control.

internationalization.title: Global Platform
internationalization.description: Available in 6 languages with automatic browser detection. Community-driven translations for worldwide accessibility.

pluginManagement.title: Plugin Management
pluginManagement.description: Browse, configure, and manage MCP servers and plugins
pluginManagement.content: Connect various AI tools and services through a unified interface. Configure and manage your plugins from a central dashboard.

aiPlayground.title: AI Playground
aiPlayground.description: Test and experiment with your AI tools in an interactive environment
aiPlayground.content: Experience your plugins in action. The playground allows you to test different configurations and see real-time results.

customDevelopment.title: Custom Development
customDevelopment.description: Create and customize your own MCP servers and tools
customDevelopment.benefit1: Discover innovative servers from fellow developers.
customDevelopment.benefit2: Get feedback and ratings on your shared servers.
customDevelopment.benefit3: Collaborate and build upon community creations.
customDevelopment.benefit4: Stay updated with the latest MCP trends.
customDevelopment.content: Build custom capabilities using our Python editor and integrated development environment. Extend your AI with specialized functionalities.

langchainAbstraction.title: Test Any Model: Langchain Abstraction
langchainAbstraction.description: Plugged.in uses the Langchain abstraction layer so you can test your MCP servers with Claude, GPT, Llama, and moreâ€”all from a single interface. Instantly compare models, future-proof your workflow, and experience true model-agnostic AI.

opensource.title: Proudly Open Source
opensource.subtitle: Built by the community, for the community. Contribute and shape the future of MCP.
opensource.contribute: Join our open-source community and help us build the future of AI integration

app.description: The main application - Next.js web platform for MCP management

proxy.description: Universal proxy server for Model Context Protocol

community.title: Join the Global MCP Community
community.subtitle: Connect with thousands of developers building the future of AI
community.description: Share your MCP servers, follow developers, get real-time notifications, and collaborate within our social platform. Build your reputation with ratings, reviews, and community contributions.

socialFeatures.title: Social Platform Features
socialFeatures.profiles: Public developer profiles with activity feeds
socialFeatures.following: Follow developers and get updates on their work
socialFeatures.notifications: Real-time notifications for follows, shares, and updates
socialFeatures.reputation: Build your reputation through community engagement

community.benefit1: Discover innovative servers from fellow developers.
community.benefit2: Get feedback and ratings on your shared servers.
community.benefit3: Collaborate and build upon community creations.
community.benefit4: Stay updated with the latest MCP trends.

search.title: Intelligent Discovery Engine
search.subtitle: Find the perfect MCP server across GitHub, Smithery, and npm
search.description: Our advanced discovery engine searches multiple sources and uses community signals to surface the best tools for your needs.
search.imagePlaceholder: Image: Search results showing community servers (CardGrid Mockup)
search.feature1Desc: Natural language search that understands what you're looking for, not just keywords.
search.feature2Desc: Filter by ratings, installations, recent updates, and developer reputation.
search.feature3Desc: Find servers by the exact capabilities you need - tools, resources, or prompts.
search.feature4Desc: Test servers directly from search results without installation.

playground.title: Universal AI Testing Playground
playground.subtitle: Test any MCP server with any AI model - Claude, GPT, Llama, and more.
playground.feature1Desc: Test with Claude, GPT-4, Llama, Gemini, and dozens more through our Langchain integration.
playground.feature2Desc: Upload documents, create knowledge bases, and query them instantly with any model.
playground.feature3Desc: Handle massive conversations with virtual scrolling and optimized performance.
playground.feature4Desc: Set model-specific instructions and system prompts for precise control.
playground.feature5Desc: Track all operations with detailed logs, execution analytics, and performance metrics.
playground.langchainCallout: <0>Test with Any Model:</0> Thanks to our <1>Langchain abstraction</1>, you can test your MCP servers with Claude, GPT, Llama, and moreâ€”all from a single playground. Instantly compare models and experience true model-agnostic AI.

collections.title: Smart Collections & Version Control
collections.subtitle: Coming Soon: Organize, version, and share your MCP server collections
collections.description: Soon you'll be able to create versioned collections, track installations, collaborate with teams, and maintain different configurations for dev, staging, and production.

versionControl.title: Version Control for Collections
versionControl.feature1: Create snapshots of your collections at any point
versionControl.feature2: Roll back to previous versions when needed
versionControl.feature3: Track changes and see what's different between versions
versionControl.feature4: Share specific versions with your team

sharing.title: Public & Private Sharing
sharing.public: Share collections publicly with the community
sharing.ratings: Get feedback and ratings from users

collections.collectionsDesc: Group related MCP servers into logical collections for specific clients, applications, or environments.
collections.workspacesDesc: Isolate projects with dedicated workspaces. Switch instantly between development, staging, and production configurations.

sharing.title: Community Sharing
sharing.subtitle: Share with others
sharing.description: Share your MCP servers and tools with the community.

security.title: Your Data, Your Rules
security.subtitle: Complete control over your AI-generated intellectual property
security.description: We believe security means ownership. Every piece of data you generate remains yours, protected by enterprise-grade security and exportable anytime.

dataOwnership.title: Full Data Ownership
dataOwnership.desc: Every prompt, response, and configuration belongs to you. Export anytime in open formats.

endToEndEncryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEndEncryption.desc: Your AI configurations and data stay secure at rest and in transit with military-grade encryption

auditEverything.title: Audit Everything
auditEverything.desc: Full transparency on how your AI data is used. Track every operation and API call.

portableData.title: Portable Encryption
portableData.desc: Take your encrypted data anywhere. No vendor lock-in, ever.

oauthSecurity.title: OAuth & Token Security
oauthSecurity.desc: Secure authentication flows with fine-grained permissions across all your AI services

selfhost.title: Self-Hosting Option
selfhost.desc: Ultimate control with on-premise deployment. Your data never leaves your infrastructure.

security.compliance: Your data sovereignty is our priority. GDPR compliant with right to deletion and data portability.

developers.title: Built for Developers
developers.subtitle: Powerful tools and APIs to extend your AI capabilities
developers.description: Open-source platform with comprehensive APIs, SDKs, and developer tools.

opensource.title: 100% Open Source
opensource.desc: MIT licensed with transparent development on GitHub

apis.title: RESTful APIs
apis.desc: Complete API coverage for all platform features

sdks.title: TypeScript SDK
sdks.desc: Type-safe SDK with full IntelliSense support

extensibility.title: Plugin Architecture
extensibility.desc: Extend the platform with custom MCP servers and integrations

documentation.title: Comprehensive Docs
documentation.desc: Detailed documentation with examples and tutorials

community.title: Active Community
community.desc: Reddit, X, GitHub discussions, and community support

pricing.title: Completely Free - No Hidden Costs
pricing.subtitle: We believe in democratizing AI data ownership. Every feature, for everyone, forever.

free.title: Everything Included
free.description: No limits, no tiers, no surprises
free.note: No credit card required â€¢ Always free for personal use

whyFree.title: Why is plugged.in free?
whyFree.description: We're building the future of AI data ownership. Our mission is to ensure everyone has control over their AI-generated data. By keeping the platform free, we're creating the largest ecosystem where developers can share, learn, and build together.

gettingStarted.description: Follow our quick start guide to connect your first MCP server and start building.
